mapper.select: select * from guestbook order by guestbookContentNum DESC
mapper.insert: insert into GuestBook values( seq_guestbook_idx.nextVal, #{guestbookContentName}, #{guestbookContent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: update guestbook set guestbookContent = #{ guestbookContent }, guestbookContentName = #{ guestbookContentName }, guestbookRegdate = SYSDATE where guestbookContentNum=#{guestbookContentNum}
